languages.text: {n}Понизив голос, Комиссар говорит:{/n} "Ты на глазах у всей Комморры порвал{mf||а} в клочки Кровавых прозелитов, элиту элит. Это не просто плевок в лицо Кикеросс и ее подружкам — считай, что ты публично уязвил{mf||а} гордость всех видевших это друкари. С тем же успехом можно было бы нассать на статую Векта у всех на виду, и то меньше резонанса было бы. Любят друкари свои арены, что поделать". {n}Комиссар виновато пожимает плечами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Понизив голос, Комиссар говорит:{/n} "Ты на глазах у всей Комморры порвал{mf||а} в клочки Кровавых прозелитов, элиту элит. Это не просто плевок в лицо Кикеросс и ее подружкам — считай, что ты публично уязвил{mf||а} гордость всех видевших это друкари. С тем же успехом можно было бы нассать на статую Векта у всех на виду, и то меньше резонанса было бы. Любят друкари свои арены, что поделать". {n}Комиссар виновато пожимает плечами.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}The Commissar says in a lowered voice,{/n} "You wiped the floor with the Bloodstained Proselytes, the elite of the elite, in front of all of Commorragh. You didn't just spit in the faces of Keykeross and her chums, you publicly wounded the pride of every Drukhari who saw it happen. Pissing on a statue of Vect with everyone watching would've caused less of a stink. That's the Drukhari for you — they love their arenas." {n}The Commissar shrugs apologetically.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Понизив голос, Комиссар говорит:{/n} "Ты на глазах у всей Комморры порвал{mf||а} в клочки Кровавых прозелитов, элиту элит. Это не просто плевок в лицо Кикеросс и ее подружкам — считай, что ты публично уязвил{mf||а} гордость всех видевших это друкари. С тем же успехом можно было бы нассать на статую Векта у всех на виду, и то меньше резонанса было бы. Любят друкари свои арены, что поделать". {n}Комиссар виновато пожимает плечами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Commissar says in a lowered voice,{/n} "You wiped the floor with the Bloodstained Proselytes, the elite of the elite, in front of the whole Commorragh. You didn't just spit Keykeross and her chums in the face — you publicly wounded the pride of every Drukhari who saw it happen. Even taking a piss on a statue of Vect with everyone watching would've made less of a stink. That's the Drukhari for you — they sure love their arenas." {n}The Commissar shrugs apologetically.{/n}

languages.text: {n}コミッサーは小さな声で言う。{/n}「陛下はエリート中のエリートである血まみれの改宗者たちを、コモラフ中が見ている前で一掃したのです。キーケロスとその仲間に唾を吐きかけただけでなく、それを見たすべてのデュカーリのプライドを公然と傷つけたのですよ。ヴェクトの銅像に小便をかけただけでも大問題なのに。あれこそまさにデュカーリ、あいつらは闘技場が大好きなのです」{n}コミッサーは申し訳なさそうに肩をすくめた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar says in a lowered voice,{/n} "You wiped the floor with the Bloodstained Proselytes, the elite of the elite, in front of all of Commorragh. You didn't just spit in the faces of Keykeross and her chums, you publicly wounded the pride of every Drukhari who saw it happen. Pissing on a statue of Vect with everyone watching would've caused less of a stink. That's the Drukhari for you — they love their arenas." {n}The Commissar shrugs apologetically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーは小さな声で言う。{/n}「陛下はエリート中のエリートである血まみれの改宗者たちを、コモラフ中が見ている前で一掃したのです。キーケロスとその仲間に唾を吐きかけただけでなく、それを見たすべてのデュカーリのプライドを公然と傷つけたのですよ。ヴェクトの銅像に小便をかけただけでも大問題なのに。あれこそまさにデュカーリ、あいつらは闘技場が大好きなのです」{n}コミッサーは申し訳なさそうに肩をすくめた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}政委压低了声音。{/n}“你当着整个科摩罗所有观众的面，杀光了那些‘血腥叛党’，把她精英中的精英全都干掉了。你的做法不仅羞辱了绮克萝丝和她的爪牙，还伤害了所有黑暗灵族观众的自尊。哪怕是在众目睽睽之下朝维克特的雕像撒泡尿，也不会这么羞辱人。所以黑暗灵族才给你准备了这样的死亡陷阱，估计他们应该很热爱这座竞技场吧。”{n}政委充满歉意地耸了耸肩。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar says in a lowered voice,{/n} "You wiped the floor with the Bloodstained Proselytes, the elite of the elite, in front of all of Commorragh. You didn't just spit in the faces of Keykeross and her chums, you publicly wounded the pride of every Drukhari who saw it happen. Pissing on a statue of Vect with everyone watching would've caused less of a stink. That's the Drukhari for you — they love their arenas." {n}The Commissar shrugs apologetically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}政委压低了声音。{/n}“你当着整个科摩罗所有观众的面，杀光了那些‘血腥叛党’，把她精英中的精英全都干掉了。你的做法不仅羞辱了绮克萝丝和她的爪牙，还伤害了所有黑暗灵族观众的自尊。哪怕是在众目睽睽之下朝维克特的雕像撒泡尿，也不会这么羞辱人。所以黑暗灵族才给你准备了这样的死亡陷阱，估计他们肯定很热爱这座竞技场吧。”{n}政委充满歉意地耸了耸肩。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}El Comisario dice en voz baja,{/n} «Ha aplastado completamente a los Prosélitos Ensangrentados, la élite de la élite, delante de toda Commorragh. No solo ha escupido en la cara a Keykeross y sus amigas, sino que ha herido públicamente el orgullo de todos los Drukhari que lo han visto. Habría causado menos revuelo meando sobre una estatua de Vect delante de todo el mundo. Así son los Drukhari: les encantan sus arenas». {n}El Comisario se encoge de hombros disculpándose.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar says in a lowered voice,{/n} "You wiped the floor with the Bloodstained Proselytes, the elite of the elite, in front of all of Commorragh. You didn't just spit in the faces of Keykeross and her chums, you publicly wounded the pride of every Drukhari who saw it happen. Pissing on a statue of Vect with everyone watching would've caused less of a stink. That's the Drukhari for you — they love their arenas." {n}The Commissar shrugs apologetically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Comisario dice en voz baja,{/n} «Ha aplastado completamente a los Prosélitos Ensangrentados, la élite de la élite, delante de todo el Commorragh. No solo ha escupido en la cara a Keykeross y sus amigas, sino que ha herido públicamente el orgullo de todos los Drukhari que lo han visto. Habría causado menos revuelo meando sobre una estatua de Vect delante de todo el mundo. Así son los Drukhari: les encantan sus estadios». {n}El Comisario se encoge de hombros disculpándose.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Der Kommissar sagt mit gesenkter Stimme:{/n} "Ihr habt vor den Augen von ganz Commorragh den Boden mit den Blutbefleckten Proselyten gewischt, der Elite der Elite. Ihr habt Keykeross und ihren Kumpanen nicht nur ins Gesicht gespuckt, nein, Ihr habt öffentlich den Stolz jeden Drukharis verletzt, der es miterlebt hat. Selbst vor den Augen aller an eine Vect-Statue zu pissen, wäre weniger schlimm gewesen. So sind die Drukhari eben ... sie lieben ihre Arenen." {n}Der Kommissar zuckt entschuldigend mit den Achseln.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar says in a lowered voice,{/n} "You wiped the floor with the Bloodstained Proselytes, the elite of the elite, in front of all of Commorragh. You didn't just spit in the faces of Keykeross and her chums, you publicly wounded the pride of every Drukhari who saw it happen. Pissing on a statue of Vect with everyone watching would've caused less of a stink. That's the Drukhari for you — they love their arenas." {n}The Commissar shrugs apologetically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kommissar sagt mit leiser Stimme:{/n} "Ihr habt vor den Augen von ganz Commorragh den Boden mit den Blutbefleckten Proselyten gewischt, der Elite der Elite. Ihr habt Keykeross und ihren Kumpanen nicht einfach nur ins Gesicht gespuckt, nein, Ihr habt öffentlich den Stolz jeden Drukharis verletzt, der es miterlebt hat. Selbst vor den Augen aller auf eine Vect-Statue zu pissen, wäre weniger schlimm gewesen. So sind die Drukhari eben, sie lieben ihre Arenen." {n}Der Kommissar zuckt entschuldigend mit den Achseln.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: « Vous n'avez fait qu'une bouchée des Prosélytes sanglants, l'élite de l'élite, {n}répond le commissaire en baissant le ton.{/n} Ce faisant, vous n'avez pas simplement craché au visage de Keykeross et de ses acolytes, mais vous avez aussi publiquement blessé dans leur orgueil tous les Drukhari qui ont assisté au spectacle. Pisser sur la statue de Vect devant tout Commorragh n'aurait pas eu autant l'effet d'une bombe. Les Drukhari sont très susceptibles avec tout ce qui touche à leurs arènes. » {n}Le commissaire hausse les épaules d'un air désolé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar says in a lowered voice,{/n} "You wiped the floor with the Bloodstained Proselytes, the elite of the elite, in front of all of Commorragh. You didn't just spit in the faces of Keykeross and her chums, you publicly wounded the pride of every Drukhari who saw it happen. Pissing on a statue of Vect with everyone watching would've caused less of a stink. That's the Drukhari for you — they love their arenas." {n}The Commissar shrugs apologetically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez fait qu'une bouchée des Prosélytes Entachés de sang, l'élite de l'élite, {n}répond le commissaire en baissant le ton.{/n} Ce faisant, vous n'avez pas simplement craché au visage de Keykeross et de ses petits copains, mais vous avez publiquement blessé dans leur orgueil tous les Drukhari qui ont assisté au spectacle. Pisser sur la statue de Vect devant tout Commorragh n'aurait pas eu autant l'effet d'une bombe. Mais bon, les Drukhari sont très susceptibles avec tout ce qui touche à l'arène. » {n}Le commissaire hausse les épaules d'un air désolé.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Komiser, kısık sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Tüm Commorragh'ın gözlerinin önünde seçkinlerin seçkini Kızıl Zındıklar'ı paspas gibi çiğnediniz. Keykeross ve ahbaplarının suratına tükürmekle kalmadınız, buna tanık olan tüm Drukharilerin gururunu da göz göre göre ayaklar altına aldınız. Herkes izlerken Vect'in heykellerinden birinin üzerine işeseydiniz daha az yaygara kopardı. Drukhariler böyledir işte... Mesele arena ise akan sular durur." {n}Komiser, mahcupça omuz silkiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar says in a lowered voice,{/n} "You wiped the floor with the Bloodstained Proselytes, the elite of the elite, in front of all of Commorragh. You didn't just spit in the faces of Keykeross and her chums, you publicly wounded the pride of every Drukhari who saw it happen. Pissing on a statue of Vect with everyone watching would've caused less of a stink. That's the Drukhari for you — they love their arenas." {n}The Commissar shrugs apologetically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser kısık sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Tüm Commorragh'ın gözlerinin önünde seçkinlerin seçkini Kızıl Zındıklar'ı paspas gibi çiğnedin. Keykeross ve ahbaplarının suratına tükürmekle kalmadın, ayrıca buna tanık olan tüm Drukharilerin gururunu da göz göre göre ayaklar altına aldın. Herkes izlerken Vect'in heykellerinden birinin üzerine işeseydin daha az yaygara kopardı. Drukhariler böyledir işte... Arena dedin mi akan sular durur." {n}Komiser mahcup mahcup omuz silkiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
